OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'greynoise'.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

GREYNOISE_FEED_API_KEY.description: The API key to connect to Greynoise.

GREYNOISE_FEED_LIMIT.description: Max number of indicators to ingest.

GREYNOISE_FEED_IMPORT_METADATA.description: Import metadata (cities, sightings, etc.). ⚠️ Can generate a lot of data.

GREYNOISE_FEED_IMPORT_DESTINATION_SIGHTI.description: Import indicator's countries (from metadata) as a Sighting.

GREYNOISE_FEED_INDICATOR_SCORE_MALICIOUS.description: Default indicator score for malicious indicators.

GREYNOISE_FEED_INDICATOR_SCORE_SUSPICIOU.description: Default indicator score for suspicious indicators.

GREYNOISE_FEED_INDICATOR_SCORE_BENIGN.description: Default indicator score for benign indicators.
